metadata.title: CVE-2017-6802 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.2. There is a potentialheap-based buffer over-read on incoming Compressed RTF Streams, related toDecompressRTF() in libytnef.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.2-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libytnef package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1').
